titles.title: From the sun's rising to the sun's setting

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
From the sun's rising to the sun's setting
In every place His name will be praised
And from Mount Zion to furthest island
Let the hosannas be raised.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Great is the Lord even beyond the borders of Israel,
Great, great is the Lord,
Great is the Lord even beyond the borders of Israel,
Great, great is the Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
The Lamb is worthy to receive glory,
For He has purchased man with His blood
From every nation to be a kingdom
Reigning on earth for our God!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Greater is His might than forces of night
And in His people His power will be shown.
His resurrection brought to subjection
Everything under His throne.
